a.n: Acb kb 16 clash of titans, targoviste, romania, 13.07.2018

p.k: July 13 in TÃ¢rgovite will be held the tournament in professional kickboxing ACB KB-16: Clash of Titans. Loud slogan means loud fight card which will gather the most competitive kickboxers from Romania, Russia and Europe. In the main event of the evening the star of Romanian kickboxing Andrei Stoica will demonstrate the power of the heavyweight division. The legend of K-1 Albert Kraus will please all fans with a quality and uncompromising fight and this is not the entire list of high-class kickboxers who will perform at this event.
